games.title: Police Chase Simulator
games.description:
Dive into the world of police chases, destruction, and crazy races!
Choose from over 15 vehicles, including sedans, SUVs, trucks, and special cars.

üó∫Ô∏è Maps:
‚Ä¢ üåÜ City with wide streets and green suburbs.
‚Ä¢ üåï Moon with low gravity and a cosmic backdrop.
‚Ä¢ üèûÔ∏è Countryside with hills, jumpable rocks, and a destruction zone.
‚Ä¢ üõ†Ô∏è Test area with ramps, presses, and numerous props for experimentation.

üé® Tuning:
‚Ä¢ Full control over your car's appearance ‚Äî paint every detail.
‚Ä¢ Adjust wheels: change camber, height, and size!

‚öôÔ∏è Destruction Physics:
‚Ä¢ Cars crumple, doors and wheels fall off, windows shatter!
‚Ä¢ Environment partially destructible, creating explosions and chaos.

‚è≥ Time Control:
‚Ä¢ Enjoy time-slowing effects for epic moments with a single click.

üèÅ Game Modes:
‚Ä¢ Choose between racing or sandbox for free driving.
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
TAB - pause menu (or Escape)

WASD - driving.
Spacebar - handbrake.
Shift - nitro.
C - change camera.
R - reset car.
K - restore car.
B - slow down time.

For mobile devices, use the game interface.

games.title: Barry Prison: Parkour Escape!
games.description: Join the exhilarating adventure of Barry Prison: Parkour Escape! Navigate complex parkour obstacles, outsmart Warden Barry, and gather items like coins and jetpacks to execute your escape. Play for free on your phone or computer and prove your skills in this ultimate test of freedom!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:

üíªComputer:
Mouse - camera rotation
WASD - movement
Space - jump
Enter - use items
Shift - jetpack
Tab - menu

üì± Mobile device:
Use the interface buttons on the screen

games.title: Car Crash Test: Abandoned City
games.description:
Immerse yourself in an adrenaline-pumping world of destruction and speed!
Bimka is an abandoned city with destruction online is a game where you control cars that break down with stunning realism. Doors, hoods, and wheels can all fly off with a powerful impact! Explore a vast open world filled with ramps, presses, and other tools for epic destruction.

Create unique cars by changing the color of the body, details, and adjusting the size and alignment of the wheels. Meet other cars speeding along the roads and compete with them in spectacular crashes. Enjoy crazy jumps, collisions, and complete freedom of action!
Realistic car destruction
Customization: color, wheels, and style
Vast open world
Unique crash test sites
Destroy, build, and race - create your own chaos on the road!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
WASD - steer the car
Space - brake hard
Shift - enable nitro
C - switch camera
N - change car
R - put car back in service
K - repair car
B - slow down time
Tab - open pause

On mobile: use the buttons on the screen.
Goal: drive, crash, tune - do whatever you want!

games.title: School Of Basketball
games.description: It is the basketball arcade game in which you must try to score baskets in all the different game modes available. A basketball school opens its doors for enthusiasts like you. Do you know where to aim the ball so that you always hit the basket? Do you know any secret strategies? You have a limited number of balls and every time you miss, you also miss one ball. However, if you never miss, on the contrary, sometimes the ball will be added. How many points will you score?
games.howToPlayText:
Touch and drug anywhere on screen to throw a ball!
You can play either arcade, time attack, and distance mode. Arcade mode gives you 10 balls to use; you must continue to score baskets although it becomes harder each time you score.
Time attack mode requires you to score as many baskets within the time limit as possible; you have unlimited balls but limited time. 
Distance mode allows you to increase the distance of your shot each time that you score. The distance decreases every time you miss a shot, don‚Äôt let the distance reach zero; otherwise, it is game over.

games.title: Parking Boom
games.description:
Parking Boom is a fun and addictive physics-based game where your goal is to launch your car straight into the parking spot!
Adjust the power and angle, smash through other vehicles along the way, and try to land as accurately as possible.

Each level offers unique obstacles and creative challenges that make your ride exciting and unpredictable.
Sharpen your parking skills, beat level after level, and aim for perfection in this fast-paced and explosive adventure.

With a variety of cars, dynamic stages, and tons of destruction, Parking Boom turns every parking attempt into a chaotic thrill ride!
If you're looking for something fresh, loud, and action-packed, Parking Boom will drive you into a world where crashing is half the fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Aim Your Car
Adjust the angle, direction and power using the mouse or touching the screen.

Launch and Crash
Release to launch your car. Smash through other vehicles as you fly toward the parking spot.

Park Accurately
Try to land your car inside the highlighted parking zone.

games.title: Soccer Training
games.description: In Soccer Training, your aspirations in soccer become a reality as you enter the prestigious realm of the world‚Äôs top team. This sports game turns your device into a football pitch where your free-kick skills are challenged to the maximum. With 15 levels, each progressively tougher than the one before, you'll require all of your accuracy and strength to prevail.
games.howToPlayText: Accuracy is essential in Soccer Training‚Äîfocus on the corners of the goal to improve your scoring opportunities. Be mindful of moving targets‚Äîthey increase your score but can be challenging! Don‚Äôt feel disheartened by shots that get blocked; instead, use them as a learning experience and modify your next attempt accordingly.

games.title: Cars
games.description: Become a car driver in this thrilling online racing game! Overtake vehicles, avoid crashes, and race to beat your high score. Tap gas or brake to master the road and show your best result. Play now for fast-paced driving fun!
games.howToPlayText: In this game you will become a car driver! Press the gas to overtake cars, and brake to avoid crashing, and so pass as many cars as possible and show your best result in this race!

games.title: Stickboy Epic Swordsman
games.description: Embrace your warrior spirit in Stickboy Epic Swordsman, an exciting online game where you equip diverse armor, face tough challenges, and defeat powerful bosses. Explore a vibrant world, gather exclusive gear, and find unique swords to enhance your combat tactics. Rise through the ranks and test your skills against others.
games.howToPlayText: Control your character with the WAD keys (computer) or virtual buttons (smartphone/tablet), E key punch or virtual punch button.

games.title: Shoot & Sprint: Warfare
games.description: In the game, you will find yourself in the role of a brave fighter who rushes forward without stopping. Your task is to shoot the enemies and survive in this fast‚Äîpaced action game.
games.howToPlayText:
Here's everything you need to know to become a shooting master.:

Basic rules
Automatic running: Your character runs forward by himself. You don't need to control the movement ‚Äî just focus on shooting.

Shooting: Use the screen or mouse button to shoot in different directions. Enemies are appearing from all sides, so be prepared for quick shootouts.

Management
Shooting: Tap on the screen or use the buttons to shoot.

Save ammo: Shoot accurately to avoid wasting ammo.

Collect bonuses: You can find first-aid kits, ammo, and temporary weapon upgrades on the levels.

Upgrade weapons: After each level, unlock new weapons and upgrade them for more damage.
